contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 4, 1996 D NWABBA Contest (Championship Section)
NWABBA Contest (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-championship-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Guild Hall, Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Best solo cornet - D.Richardson (Glossop). Prizes - 1st £150 and cup, 2nd £100 and trophy, 3rd £50 and cup. 10 bands competed. 49th annual contest
March 24, 2015, 10:47 a.m. June 29, 2016, 9:42 a.m.
1 Glossop Old Band Douglas Blackledge Prisms
2 United Norwest Co-op Rochdale Band Roy Curran The Essence of Time
3 Blackburn and Darwen Band Edward Tarling The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
Unknown Result Tintwistle Band Barry Thompson Spectrum [Vinter]
Unknown Result British Aerospace (Chadderton) Simon Wood Spectrum [Vinter]
Unknown Result Freckleton Band Paul Dalton The Essence of Time
Unknown Result Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band Lindsay Lawrie Endeavour [Sparke]
Unknown Result Longridge Band Gordon Clough The Essence of Time
Unknown Result Stockport Brass Alan Lawton Paganini Variations
Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Peter Christian Variations on a Ninth
